about_the_game:
Friday Fever is a vibrant and visually striking visual novel with puzzle elements that will immerse you in a world of unexpected encounters and thrilling surprises. Beneath the vibrant exterior, a darker, more twisted reality awaits — a hellish brothel where suffering and lust intertwine in a volatile mix. Here, the air is thick with temptation and torment, where every pleasure is tainted with pain, and every desire brings its own punishment.

Story
Prospero, an eccentric brothel owner who loves to shock and surprise his clientele, has recently introduced his latest captive—a beast of legend. Straight from the dark, forgotten woods, he presents an ancient satyr, straight out of myth and folklore. Wasting no time, Prospero prepares an unforgettable show for his VIP clients, pairing his tiny, innocent protégée with the well-hung beast in a spectacle of primal urges and forbidden passions. But there may be more to this new arrival than meets the eye—perhaps she wasn’t captured by chance, and a darker, more sinister plan is unfolding behind the scenes.

  • Engaging Visual Novel Experience: Dive into a rich story filled with captivating characters, vibrant visuals, and unexpected twists.

  • Challenging Jigsaw Puzzles: Solve jigsaw puzzles that enhance the storytelling and reveal stunning artwork.

  • Stunning Art and Design: Enjoy beautifully crafted visuals that bring the world of Friday Fever to life.

  • Immersive Soundtrack: Enjoy a carefully curated soundtrack that sets the mood and enhances every scene.

  • One-Handed Play Mode: Designed for comfort, so you can fully immerse yourself in the experience… with one hand free for other activities.

    In this world of sin and shadows, where lust and suffering coexist, every choice draws you deeper into the abyss. Can you navigate the delicate balance between pleasure and pain, or will you be consumed by the darkness within?

content_descriptors.notes:
This game involves topics that customers may have a sensitivity to, and would like to be aware of, such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM, humiliation, transgender sex and sadomasochism.
 This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 20 years old.
 This game contains nudity, graphic depictions oral,  anal, and non-penetrative sexual acts, BDSM elements, mention of rape. 
 This game doesn't contains the following content: drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, suicide.

The developer holds full and exclusive rights to commercially utilize the aforementioned artworks provided by the artist, within the context of creating and distributing this game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Friday Fever

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: If you’re a fan of naughty and daring futa girls, Friday Fever is the game for you! This vibrant and visually striking visual novel will immerse you in a world of unexpected encounters and thrilling surprises.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
